text: Joan Beaufort (c. 1404 â€“ 15 July 1445) was the Queen Consort of Scotland from 1424 to 1437. She was the wife of King James I of Scotland. She was the Regent of Scotland during part of the minority of her son James II (from 1437 to 1439). Category:1400s births Category:1445 deaths Category:Kings and Queens consort of Scotland
title: Joan Beaufort, Queen of Scots
